title: account locked
body: i try to log on my account but it said account locked due to unuseual activity or behavior ...and i have send 3 email to suport .and they still have no reply my email.....i have no idea what to do now !{{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
Support can take 24-48 hours to respond, and sending another ticket will bump you back to the bottom of the queue, so just be patient.

The first thing you should do is change your password and the password of the attached email address.

Just to make sure, you are directing your tickets to: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new ?

Once they make contact they will likely ask you to submit an account recovery ticket (it will ask you a bunch of questions about the account) to verify ownership and then secure the account. Once that is done they can unlock it.
